p: To characterize the phytochemical characteristic of Sb-EE, HPLC analysis was performed as described previously (Almela et al. 2006). Quercetin, luteolin and kaempferol were utilized as standard compounds. Solvent A (0.1% H 3PO 4 in H 2O) and solvent B (acetonitrile) were used as elution solvents. For analysis, a system equipped with a KNAUER (Wellchrom) HPLC-pump K-1001, a Wellchrom high-speed scanning spectrophotometer K-2600, and a four-channel deaerator K-500 and a Phenomenex Gemini C18 ODS (5 μm) column was used.
